description:
In THE Number Puzzle you follow easy rules to fill in a grid with the numbers 1-9.
So simple you will get addicted!
500 puzzles in all!
With 4 sets of rules and 4 difficulties, you'll never get tired of playing.

-Normal, Mini, Diagonal Line, and Overlapping play modes!
-The How to Play gives easy instructions for each play mode's rules!
-You can pick from 4 difficulties for each set of rules! Beginners and experts alike can enjoy!
-There's even ranked mode! Compete with other users for the fastest completion time.
-Unlock achievements! Play the game to collect all 50 background images.
name: THE Number Puzzle
intro: The definitive intellect puzzle, simple yet full of depth.
